title: Unblock frontend build for live deployment and ensure bindings match backend Candid

requirements.summary: Ensure the frontend builds cleanly against the deployed backend interface by aligning generated type bindings and actor initialization used for admin access.
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page route `/` loads successfully in the deployed environment.
`/admin` route remains functional and still requires Internet Identity + admin authorization to access admin actions.
Frontend builds successfully against the deployed backend interface (no Candid/type mismatches).

file_operations.description: Update/regenerate the frontend backend type declarations to match the deployed backend Candid interface, ensuring any actor methods referenced by the frontend (including the access-control initialization used during actor creation) are represented so TypeScript builds without mismatches. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Adjust actor initialization typing so calling the access-control initialization method does not cause TypeScript errors (prefer aligning types via updated declarations; otherwise use a narrowly-scoped type refinement) while keeping the existing Internet Identity + admin gating behavior intact. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
